Type.Name: MenuBar
Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: The MenuBar is a subclass of MenuShell which contains one to many MenuItem.

remarks.para: The result is a standard menu bar which can hold many menu items. allows for a shadow type to be set for aesthetic purposes.
This is an internal constructor, and should not be used by user code.

Docs.remarks: Chain to this constructor if you have manually registered a native value for your subclass.
